He had gained new allies, fought off incredible ninja's with his own powerful techniques and cunning, learned the powerful Sage mode and was confessed to by one of his good friends: Hinata.

He stared at the ceiling and went over the events that took place back then. Several times he smiled cheekily, yet more often than not, shame crept within those walls and he soon became somber. *I*I*I*I*


The other ninja in the village were busy at work repairing and toiling about with their tasks. However, several other ninja also had the day off, but were using it to better themselves. She had never wanted to diapered before but now, because of this dumbass and his stupid jokes, she and Hinata were now cursed to returning to a point of innocence and wearing diapers for the rest of their lives. And what was worse was that they all had sex with him! He was damn right they didn't get pregnant because of that but their virginities had been taken because of this monster. Her fist clenched, Sakura was prepared to show Naruto how she really felt about all of this. It didn't matter if he felt 'sorry' about it afterward, he had effectively ruined the lives of several kunoichi becuase of his selfishness. She was going to punch him in his broken, tear stricken, fear induced...

         Will I?Sakura thought, her mind searching for some form of realism, Will I really punch him? Can I punch him? How much control do I have in my life in total? And...does he really deserve it?

         Memories of Naruto flashed back in her mind; the snotty little brat always yelling about being the next hokage and all of his other loud mouthed antics. But there were other moments too: his revelation about being an outcast of the village, those moments were he walked by himself anywhere while all the other villagers yelled insults at him, more than likely because of the fox within his stomach, Place in the fact that Naruto was an orphan and Sakura could barely see why Naruto had done this to them in the first place. He had no one left for him, but with the girls acting as babies he had a sense of being not only a father but a lover to each of them as well.

         But there was no excusing Naruto's actions in his ultimate betrayal to his teammates and friends. Sakura's mind realed from both a sense of betrayal and a sense of remorse for what he had done. She needed to think. They all needed time to think.

         "Naruto", Sakura started because it was Hinata who said it and not her, "Could you wait in the other room for us. We need some time to ourselves for this".

         Naruto made to make a comment, but stopped himself before he even made a sound. Then, slowly he walked out and closed the door softly behind him.
13311111111122112221.title: Of Truth and Consequences

133111111111221122212.content:
Hinata shook, there were tears in her eyes as she watched him leave. She then moved to a table and knelt in front of it, her hands shaking as they were kneaded together.

         "You're not honestly thinking of forgiving that...that..." Sakura started, pointing at the door where Naruto had just left from, but before the right insult could come out, Hinata's head snapped up, eyes furious and glaring at Sakura, her byakugan activating automatically, "I don't know what to believe right now, Sakura. Our lives have just taken an upside down turn because of this and everything we know has been brought into question. But I can't hate Naruto for what he did, not entirely. We need to discuss this first before we can really say what we should or should not believe in."

         Sakura's mouth opened in shock, unbelieving to what Hinata was saying, "But he took advantage of us! He used us as his own personal toys and..."

         "Did he?!" Hinata yelled, "Did he really do that?! Does that sound like something Naruto would do?!"

         Sakura held firm but did not move. She had been thinking those exact thoughts as Hinata, but couldn't think as to how she should have taken it. Naruto had certainly changed since he was the loud-mouthed idiot. And she had changed as well, being far more respective of Naruto as a person while certainly punishing him for his...idiotic tendencies. But nothing was far more idiotic than this. But why couldn't she remember any of this.

         Hinata spoke, her voice shaking once more, "Could you please sit down, Sakura? This is something we can't just avoid or run away from. I believe there is more at stake here then how we're feeling on this and we need to talk about this or we're just going to blow it out of proportion just like Naruto."

         Sakura stared. She made several gestures, even going so far as to punching the air, all with garbled cries of indignation. In the end, she merely sat down with Hinata at the table and fumed.

         "Mind if I join in, or is this a bad time?" a voice called from behind Hinata.

         Both girls looked up to see Tenten, still naked save for her now wet diaper, a blush on her face mixed with a sense of disgruntlement.

         An outcry of her name, followed by hugs from the girls and they all sat down at the table, Sakura finding a spare shirt in the closet for her to wear. The shirt read 'Baby Girl' in white lettering on black cloth and, while inappropriate considering the mood, their wasn't much else Tenten immediately saw that would make her feel better.

         "How much did you hear?" Sakura asked, looking towards the weapons mistress.

         Tenten sighed, "I woke up back to normal just as Naruto came back. I was going to surprise you all when Naruto spilled his guts to us. And boy howdy, they're looking pretty messed up, aren't they? Hypnosis, regression, betrayal and now we aren't even sure what to believe in anymore."

         Both girls nodded glumly, Hinata sniffling as she did so. Sakura looked in her direction, remembering that out of all of them she was the one who loved Naruto the most. How could he do this to her?

         "Still, can't rule out Naruto's behavior in all this. After all, we all know its been pretty crappy, and only getting crappier from here on. I mean, look at what happened recently. The entire village was destroyed and we're still trying to recover from it. Seems silly that this is one of the few buildings left standing, huh?" Tenten said, looking around the room in nostalgia and humor, "I seem to remember this is where you and I started touching ourselves in our diapees, Sakura."

         Sakura gaped at the girl and blushed while crying out, "Tenten! Wait...we...touched ourselves?"

         A faint memory popped into Sakura's head. She and Tenten were in fact here but then they were changing each other. Sakura was hesitant about something and Tenten seemed to want to...ease her worries. This was so frustrating! Why did Naruto have to go and tell them to forget those memories? They at least could have helped in punishing the pervert.

         "Yep" Tenten asked, looking at the pink haired girl, "We did. I was surprised when I remembered, but I think they're coming back, slowly. But I'm not going to deny it; I thought it was sexy wearing a diaper and having someone take care of us. Spared us the thought of having to do it ourselves and I kinda...liked it." Now it was her turn to blush, something the other girls had never really seen her do before, except near Neji, "It kinda felt like we got a small vacation from having to act like big girls and instead being little ones."

         "Didn't stop him from touching us too," Sakura grumbled, her fist shaking again.

         "Yeah, you're right. but then again, he was never the one to start that kind of thing. At least...not that I recall. From what I remember, we were the ones who moved in first. Remember when I first showed up and he told us about the camera and what he did to us when we...regressed?"

         Hinata started, "I...kissed him. Then you did" she pointed to Tenten before pointing back to Sakura, "And then you did as well, even going so far as to let him touch your-"

         "ALRIGHT! ALRIGHT!" Sakura cried, blushing furiously,"but how do we know that those were our own actions? After all, we don't know what Naruto did to us while we were hypnotised!"

         Tenten smirked, "Then, let's check the camera."

         Silence rang once more. Both Sakura and HInata looked at each other, unbelieving that they could have forgotten that bit of evidence.

         Tenten stood and walked to the drawers were the camera sat, Naruto bringing it into the room earlier that day so it could charge. With a press of a switch,Tenten turned on the camera.

         "You have to admit, this is a nice camera", Tenten remarked as she went through the settings of the device, "I'll need to remember to ask where he got it from. Provided the evidence against him."

         It seemed the camera had really been used all but twice. The newest rendition was when Naruto had recorded the sessions from earlier, seeing as the girls were made to regress as they took off their clothes.

         "So that's what it was like..." Tenten said as she watched the events unfolding while Hinata and Sakura blushed. She laughed when the immature teens suddenly reveled in their sudden breasts and then watched as the two girls played and toddled about while Naruto stood guard as caretaker. Then, he seemed to realize something and left the house, locking the doors behind him as he did so. The moment the girls seemed to snap out of their transformatoin, Naruto came back, exclaiming about Tenten. Then, the video cut off as the power meter died at that moment.

         "Bit irresponsible to leave you there while you were babies, but I think I knew what he was doing", Tenten said, her blush severely prominent.

         The other girls nodded. Naruto had been looking for Tenten since she was the one who came next in the equation.

         "Well, let's look at the older video and...OH MY GOD! You guys were so CUTE back then!" Tenten said,

         "Enough with the commentary!" Sakura growled while Hinata shifted in her diaper, the memories coming back in spurts.

         They watched as the video played, their younger counterparts playing their parts as little babies until Naruto came back, bringing in Tenten. Then, Naruto all of a sudden called out something strange, which caused each girl to freeze and listen as Naruto called out what each girl was to do at that moment.

         "Okay galls. I think we've had enough baby fun, huh? When I clap my hands, you will forget about being your recent ages and return to your normal age patterns. Then you will follow the same rules...Aside from walking outside, you will feel comfortable in being in nothing but a diaper around me, and you will use them no matter what, clothed or not. One of you or me will be the only ones to change the other, Understood?"

         "Yes...Naruto-sama."

         "And of course, none of you will be embarrassed by your problems, especially towards me and would turn to me when you need a change. Tsunade will also be like a mother figure as well and you will follow her example. Understood?"

         "Yes...Naruto-sama."

         "And should you get hungry, you will drink from either a bottle, or each otherâ€™s breasts, unless I say otherwise or if we're in public. Got it?"

         "Yes...Naruto-sama."

         The video stopped just as the girls were confronting each other about their appearances. Tenten placed the camera down onto the table, tapping her fingers on table as she was in deep thought.

         "I remember this...this was right before we decided to jump his bones for helping us", Tenten muttered, "And there didn't seem to be anything that seemed...too distasteful aside from the obvious hypnotism."

         "Really?" Sakura asked, raising an eyebrow at the weapons mistress, "The perv literally told us to drink from each others breasts. I don't think they were made for giving milk at the time."

         "That could have been so we could keep the act up", Hinata stated, "I mean...babies drink from breasts too. It would make sense if that was the intent."

         An uncomfortable silence stayed within the room, the girls waiting for one of the others to say anything.

         "I think we need to have him tell us more," Hinata said, "After all, we'll never get anywhere if we still don't know all that was meant by him."
133111111111221122212.title: Girl talk

1331111111112211222121.content:
(A/N: Gonna stop with the indents since they are a pain to set up for each paragraph)

Naruto was in the study, looking over at the pictures on the wall. They were of the fourth hokage and apparently his wife. Naruto had never realized the home he had obtained was in fact the summer home of his own father, revealed to him during the fight with Pain. There had been emotions and words flung all around then too, but nothing as hurtful as this.

He had hurt his friends. And all because of a stupid prank. How could he ever get them to trust him again? Did he even deserve to be in their presence? He couldn't even make them forget all that happened to them since they were replaying the exact same scenario as before. But now, their bodies had grown, developed into women with bodies that were far from infantile or childish. They were now grown, older and, despite Naruto's protestations, sexy. Just seeing Hinata and Sakura changing each other had made him feel...aroused. But it had also made him happy that they could trust him like that without any mind tricks.

The door squeaked open and a wide eyed Hinata came in, looking around with anxiety for the only male present. Spotting Naruto by the window, she sighed in relief. Naruto however was a bit hesitant, wondering what she would say to him.

"N-Naruto..." she said, giving him a hopeful but desperate look, "We need to talk...back in the nursery..."

*I*I*I*I*I*


"Tenten?" Naruto cried in surprise, "When did you-?"

"Woke up during the drama. Sit down, buddy. We've gotta talk", Tenten said, slapping the table.

Naruto gulped, moving to sit down on the opposite side of the table from Tenten. Sakura had moved to join the other girl on her right. Hinata moved after Naruto but moved to also join Tenten on the opposite side of the table. Naruto was hoping Hinata was still on his side but was not disappointing in her action. He sat more resigned in her reasoning than anything else.

"Naruto", Tenten said, "We saw the tape that you took of us three years ago."

Naruto was surprised, "The one that cut off before I used the jutsu again?"

"Well...it didn't so much as cut off as the battery died. We...just hadn't noticed that the first time. But it continued and we saw the jutsu used on us".

Naruto hung his head in shame. It had come to this, as he knew it would.

"Naruto", Hinata said, "We just wanted to know your true intention with the jutsu. Why did you do all of this?"

Naruto looked at her. Whatever warmth or hope he had expected from Hinata was not existant at the moment. She was staring at him with the expression well suited of her clan. Tenten seemed to be more intrigued of the situation but her eyes betrayed a look of danger if Naruto's answer wasn't satisfactory. Sakura on the other hand wasn't even hinting at subtle. She was holding back her rage, but there was a look of hurt, betrayal and altogether disappointment in him.

It was too much. His shoulders started shaking as his body contorted towards the table. He placed his left arm onto the table to steady it as waves of emotions poured out of him.

"I'm sorry."

The girls looked at each other, confused.

Naruto moved to the side of the table, still keeping his distance away from the grils and bowed to them, his head touching the floor in shame, "I betrayed your trust and all for a prank. I didn't undertstand the consequences of my actions and I've ruined your lives because of it. I know you hate me and you have every right to, but all I'm asking for is forgiveness. I want to make it up to you for my mistakes but this is all I can think of right now."

His whole body was racked with pain from his trick and the loss of his loved ones. He didn't know what to do. His mind was in a whirl and he could barely breathe as the tears flowed down his face.

The girls stared at him for a while. Tenten could hear a sob coming from her left. Before anyone could move to stop her, Hinata had moved over to Naruto and had placed his hands in hers.

"Naruto", she said, her voice cracking from sadness, "What you had done was horrible, and by all means I should be hating you for what you had done. You took advantage of our kindness and placed us in a situation we can't easily escape from. Here we are now, diaper wearing kunoichi with no one to take care of us except each other and you. And you're begging us for forgiveness?"

Naruto's bit hard on his lips...this was it. The moment of truth.

"I forgive you."

Naruto froze, his eyes opening in shock. He turned to look up in Hinata's eyes, both streaming with tears as well.

"I can't decide your reasoning for hypnotizing me, Naruto. From what I saw, nothing compelled you to take our virginities on that day or to even suggest us to give ourselves to you. But I would have done it without you asking me to. I wasn't lying when I faced off against Pain on that day, Naruto. And I would never go back on my word on that. You have been hurt for far too long by both friend and stranger alike and I don't want to be the one to hate you for something I don't understand. I need you to answer my question...please."

Naruto shook once more. Everything hinged on what he would or wouldn't say.

"I never lied when I said that the whole thing was made as a prank. I hadn't earned everyone's trust then, Sasuke was a punk, Sakura was putting me down every chance she got and the majority of the villagers were still treating me like garbage."

Sakura frowned, but her features softened. She knew he was right in how unfairly she was treating him, taking it out on him while being the ditz in love that she was. All the times she yelled at him, pounded the snot out of him and overall despising of the person in front of her...because it was the popular thing to do. Whether it had something to do with Sasuke and gaining his attention was for another debacle.

"So I saw the jutsu and thought of something to use as a prank. That was it and nothing more. If I had known you would be stuck like this years from now, I never would have performed it. And now I can't fix you. And I'm sorry."

He cried now, openly. His body racked with sobs while his fists clenched painfully in Hinata's hands. Hinata took no notice of this and moved over to the weeping boy, rubbing his back with a free hand while bringing him in closer for a hug.

"Thank you, Naruto...that's all I wanted to hear", Hinata said, while hugging her friend and now confirmed lover, "I can't say I won't forget this so easily...but I know it was not made with the darkest of intentions."

No kidding thought Tenten Imagine if someone else had found this jutsu. Who knows what they could have done with it. It's a comfort to know that it at least fell into the hands of this idiot.

"I forgive you too, Naruto", Tenten said, coming over to his other side and joining in the hug, "I'm still mad you did it, but I can at least trust you with your reason why. And that if it hadn't been for you, we wouldn't have been able to experience it."

Hinata gave her a quizzical look.

"What?" Tenten shrugged, "I've been converted into a diaper lover. I don't mind sharing, especially if its with my fellow babies."

Naruto chuckled wiping his tears from his eyes. They were bloodshot from crying so much. But his troubles were far from over. Everyone turned to Sakura.

13311111111122112221211.content:
(A/N ran out of space. Here's part 2)

The girls face was downcast. She moved to stand and then sat back down in front of Naruto once more. There was a moment of silence. Then, with a whip like motion, Sakura slapped Naruto in the face.

There was no chakra within the blow, as Sakura meant for a light touch rather than her full strike. But before anyone else could react, Sakura then moved to hug the knucklehead as well.

"You didn't force us to do anything we didn't want to except for these twisted diapers. I can't say that I haven't grown fond of them myself, especially when you took care of us. You never took advantage of us during any of those times. But I hate you. I hate that you lied and manipulated us. I hate the fact that you used me as a means to play a practical joke. And I hate that my life has changed because of you."

Before Naruto could hang his head in shame again, Sakura caught his head by the chin and forced him to look him square in the eye.

"But I know it couldn't have been easier for you either. Everyone hating you, leaving you lonely and all because someone took the demon fox and stuck him in you. You've had more to suffer than us and for no good reason. That's what brings me to this quandry, Naruto".

The look she gave him was stern, as tears fell from her eyes as well.

"You do not take control of people like that. Even Ino could tell you the same thing if she were here right now. It's one of the first priniciples she learned when perfecting her jutsu; they don't abuse the powers they have been given. You did...but not to its fullest limit. You played a joke. And we suffer for it. But you didn't take the joke and turn it into something horrible. We...turned to you in our distress...and you didn't turn us away. You helped us. You found a place for us to hide when we become like this....and when we wanted pleasure....you gave it to us too."

She smiled, and kissed him on the cheek.

"I love you too, Naruto Uzumaki. It took me a while to get there, but I do. I don't want to trade that away for anything, but I can' t love someone who abuses the ones who love him as well. I want you, on your nindo, that you will never do something like that to anyone else again, especially to others who will come to feel the same way as we do."

Naruto blinked, "Um...we?"

Hinata giggled, "Who else would she be talking about silly?"

Naruto looked at Hinata, who kissed his cheek as well. then at Tenten, who hesitated a bit, "I'm still trying to see if my relationship with Neji will hold any water, but...yes...I do care for the one who diapered me as well. But I think I'm in the runner's up circle when it comes to truly loving you, Naruto."

Naruto stared all around, his heart growing and fresh new tears falling on his face again. "Thank you. All of you. I don't deserve this kindness...from any of you."

"And you propbably don't", Tenten said, causing Naruto to flinch, but she smiled, "Then again, you probably do since we all know yo to be one of the most selfless ninjas in this day and age. Boy...could you imagine if Kiba got a hold on this jutsu?"

Hinata activated her byakugan as quick as a flash, "Do not speak of such blaspheme!"

Everyone laughed, Naruto hardest of all, but he ended abruptly as a new question plagued his lips, "So, what do we do now?"

"We're not having sex if that's what you thinking about, Naruto", Sakura stated in a matter-of-fact tone, "After all this drama tonight I don't think any of us are willing to do that sort of thing with you...for a long while. Until you've proven yourself a better man, you are not touching this diapered harem for a while."

Everyone stared blankly at Sakura after she finished, her hands on her diapered hips.

"Diapered...?" Hinata started.

"Harem...?" Naruto finished.

"What? This is clearly all this was meant for and you know it", Sakura replied coyly.

"What?!" Naruto cried enraged, "Didn't I just explain that this is not what I had intended!"

"You sure did", Sakura said, playing along with Naruto's emotions, "But clearly having five girls in total at your beck and call sure seems like the start of something sleazy."

Naruto slumped, "Well, when you it that way, the truth hurts when you think about it..."

"Oh, Naruto I was only joking", Sakura replied in exasperation. Then quickly added, "About your intentions, not about the sex".

"Kinda figured", Naruto answered, "I wasn't born yesterday, Sakura. I can tell when someone's playing me."

"Coulda fooled me", Sakura said, smirking, "But the ruling still stands. You are not touching any of us unless it is to change our diapers. Think of it as an endurance test to prove yourself, Naruto."

"Oooh, this is going to be fun!" Tenten squealed in joy, "And we can use all those techniques that Anko had been teaching us in kunoichi training just to make it entertaining!"

Naruto gulped. The snake mistress of Konoha, Anko, was a seductress and deviant of the entire hidden leaf. A fan of dango and showing off her body, she was of the highest order against perverts. Naruto distrusted her for a number of reasons, though he did like the kunoichi for who she was. He was also secretly glad he had never decided to induct her though a small part of him wondered what if he had.

*I*I*I*I*


Meanwhile in a forest area near the Mountain's graveyard, a grown woman of twenty eight was resting in the forest while she and her team where hunkering down for the night. They had been searching for the remains of Orochimaru's flunkies, particularly Kabuto, but their search ended as night fell. Now they rest til the next day when a feeling ran down the kunoichi's spine.

"I sense the feelings that I am missing out on one of the greatest orgies the world has ever known", she said aloud to herself, "and I can't help but feel depressed or angry about that."

Her comrades each gave the other looks of confusion. One of the fresher ones called out,"Well, Anko-san, if you really want to-" he stopped abruptly as several small needles were thrusted below his chin, nearly grazing the skin. The sweet scent of toxins filled his nostrils.

"INTERRUPT MY THOUGHTS AGAIN, BOB! SEE WHAT HAPPENS!!!" Anko replied with a manic grin on her face.

Bob remained silent for all his life was worth. Anko turned away from him and the others shook their heads.

Greenhorn.

*I*I*I*I*


"Okay, so I don't get to be with you guys until you say so? I can handle that. More than I could hope for, really", Naruto chuckled, "But what about now?"

"We go on living, I suppose", Sakura said, rocking back and forth on her diaper, "But there was something I wanted to try out with you and HInata". She winked at the Hyuuga and both of them smiled.

"Oh?" Naruto asked, looking at both of them, "And what would..."There was a burst of chakra and smoke as both Hinata and Sakura cast a quick henshin. As the smoke cleared Naruto looked to see a smaller version of either girl beside him, both swimming in clothing far too small for them. If he to take a guess, Naruto thought they looked half their age at that point.

"You get to take care of us for a while like you did before!" Sakura replied, her voice higher than normal, "but now we have our big girl minds in these little girl bodies. And right now, we're hungry!"

Hinata smiled and nodded, looking at Naruto expectantly. Naruto could do nothing more than blink in shock at the turn of events before another explosion happened, revealing a smaller Tenten as well.

"Yeah, daddy!" Tenten replied, holding on to Naruto's right arm in a hug, "We're hungry! I haven't eaten anything all day!"

Naruto looked round at the suddenly regressed girls and sighed in exasperation. But he smiled all the same. It was going to be an interesting few weeks, that was for sure.
13311111111122112221211.title: Trusting Naruto part 2

133111111111221122212111.content:
In the darkness of the forest a lone figure runs through the branches. The light on her slim figure would suggest a woman, though the glittering of her wings suggested otherwise. She darted here and there, almost as if she never touched the Earth as she propelled herself forward, always wary in case she would come under attack.

She had no idea as to where she was. All she knew was that she must flee lest they come and find her again. She remembered only flashes of what had happened to her before; but only flashes came to mind. Her capture, her imprisonment and the eventuality of her death. But she hadn't really died. Not yet, anyway. Chōmei had helped her find a way to survive her captors by wrapping her in a camouflaged cocoon while sacrificing one of his many wings as a transformed version of her, seemingly weakened and defeated. Yet even her capture had seemed dubious.

She was with her body guards when they were confronted by three strangers, one of them seemingly familiar based on the legends of her people. The others were a Caucasian male wieding a scythe and the third was a man holding a pocket watch in his hand. This last one intrigued her as she watched the watch moving back and forth....back and forth...

Then, she remembered nothing till she woke in her cell with some unfortunate additions.

They had needed her to be weak, to be unable to defend herself while they held her. That is what she heard while they brought more of her kind into their own cells...before ripping out their souls.

She stayed in hibernation in the cocoon, awaiting the moment when the defenses would be at their weakest. The moment Chōmei sensed a lack of obstacles, the girl broke out of the cocoon and fled, hearing others chasing after her but unable to catch her.

The last she remembered she was in the land of Swamp. But that had been several days ago. Now she couldn't tell where she was at all, flitting from tree to tree as she tried in vain to hear her pursuers. Yet she did not watch were she was going and collided with what appeared to be a moving caravan.

When she awoke, she was staring into the face of a young girl with white hair, staring at her with pale eyes. She seemed so familiar but she couldn't truly tell. She thought her hair was black back then. But she wasted no time in making her needs known, especially when she felt a creeping feeling upon her psyche.

"Please...Please...you've...you....I need...help..." she whispered in a panic, almost hyperventilating as her voice cracked and turned into sobs, "Please....help me....hewp me ma ma!"

She broke down in tears as she wept into the girls lap, all the while a familiar noise she had grown accustomed to roared in the silence of her company as she flooded her full diaper with pee.

"Lady Shion!" One of the attendents cried, but the white haired woman held her hand, "Don't. I know this girl. She is to accompany us. Come, we must hurry or we will be overtaken."

info.description:
For those whom want the older characters in their story, this is the continuing adventure of Naruto and his friends as Naruto comes to grip with the powers of the Hypnosis Jutsu, originally created by OJAVIX.

The story can integrate throughout the story of Shippuden (meaning taking place at any time) but let's follow the rules shall we?:

This Jutsu works like this:
1.Hand signals in front of someone and they enter in hypnosis mode.
2.Once in hypnosis mode they will follow any command you say.
3.Once you say your commands you can wake them to start the fun or start the fun in hypnosis mode.

-Everything is acceptable, (even gay stuff, but preferably not) lesbianic stuff OK.
-I'm seeing if making all stories 10 chapters long will be a good idea. With a happy ending or bad ending depending on your choices along the story. If this works, you can even kill characters but preferably at the end of a story.
-If you decide to continue a story from the original, please follow it as it had been set up. To find the info, here is the link:
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1951333-Narutos-Hypnosis-Jutsu-Reb...

While stories can continue from the original story, new stories can be created, so for the most part, have fun with it.

Naruto and all related characters copyright their original works.
